籤詩版本二:
Ubumnene buye boyisa amandla ukususela kumaxesha amandulo, kwaye umnyango wezenzo ezilungileyo unempumelelo.
Ukuba umntu uxela le hexagram, kuya kufana nokudibana noYaojing xa unxaniwe.
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lobubele kunye nobumnene.
Kuyo yonke into, imvisiswano yinto eqhelekileyo.
解曰: Izulu nomhlaba zineemvakalelo. Yinyani enkulu. UThixo noBhuda bayakukhusela. Ungalibali into onayo.
籤詩故事一:
◇URenzong wamazi umama wakhe
Ishweshwe likaSong Zhenzong, ishweshwe elinguLiu, lalikhweleta ishweshwe likaLi ngokuzala unyana, uZhao Zhen, laza lanyoba umdlezana ukuba athathe indawo yonyana kaLishweshwe uLi afake ikati elusu. Ibhotwe elibandayo.Ishweshwe uLiu lakwazi ukugcinwa.
Emva kokuba ishweshwe likaDe liphakanyiselwe ekubeni yinkosikazi, u-Concubine De watshisa ibhotwe elibandayo waza waceba ukubulala ishweshwe uLi. Ishweshwe elinguLi lasinda lahlala phakathi kwabantu.
Ishweshwe uLi ekuqaleni waphosa uZhao Zhen emlanjeni, kodwa ngethamsanqa wahlangulwa lithenwa waza wathunyelwa kwiBhotwe leSibhodlo esisibhozo.
Kamva, uBao Zheng (uBao Qingtian) ngempazamo wadibana neNeshweshwe elinguLi elingaboniyo. Wathi akufunda inyaniso, waliphanda ngamandla elo tyala, yaye ekugqibeleni inyaniso yacaca, nto leyo eyavumela uSong Renzong ukuba aqonde ishweshwe uLi njengonina nonyana. Ishweshwe uLiu laphoswa kwibhotwe elibandayo laza ishweshwe elinguLi lamkelwa ebhotwe.Ibali laphela ngempumelelo.
聖意: Ikhaya nendlu kumnandi Ndinqwenelela ubutyebi Ndinqwenelela amathamsanqa kwishishini Umtshato nomtshato amadoda nabahambi ngeenyawo Block amasimi Isilkworms Ukwindla Inzuzo ezintandathu izilwanyana.
